show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: Fighting Junk Food Advertising That Targets Children

title: Fighting Junk Food Advertising That Targets Children
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with Anna Lappé about her new videotape and campaign at the Real Food Media Project to prevent… junk food corporations from targeting children and schools with their marketing [foodmyths.org]; poem by William Morris
